name: Appointment
title: Appointment
description: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).

elements.name: Appointment
elements.description: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: External Ids for this item.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The overall status of the Appointment. Each of the participants has their own participation status which indicates their involvement in the process, however this status indicates the shared status.

elements.name: cancelationReason
elements.description: The coded reason that this appointment is being cancelled. This is often used in reporting/billing/futher processing to determine if further actions are required, or specific fees apply.

elements.name: serviceCategory
elements.description: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment.

elements.name: serviceType
elements.description: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment.

elements.name: specialty
elements.description: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment.

elements.name: appointmentType
elements.description: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type).

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: The coded reason that this appointment is being scheduled. This is more clinical than administrative.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Reason the appointment has been scheduled to take place, as specified using information from another resource.

elements.name: priority
elements.description: The priority of the appointment. Can be used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize appointments.

elements.name: description
elements.description: The brief description of the appointment as would be shown on a subject line in a meeting request, or appointment list.

elements.name: supportingInformation
elements.description: Additional information to support the appointment provided when making the appointment.

elements.name: start
elements.description: Date/Time that the appointment is to take place.

elements.name: end
elements.description: Date/Time that the appointment is to conclude.

elements.name: minutesDuration
elements.description: Number of minutes that the appointment is to take. This can be less than the duration between the start and end times.

elements.name: slot
elements.description: The slots from the participants' schedules that will be filled by the appointment.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date that this appointment was initially created.

elements.name: comment
elements.description: Additional comments about the appointment.

elements.name: patientInstruction
elements.description: While Appointment.comment contains information for internal use, Appointment.patientInstructions is used to capture patient facing information about the Appointment.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: The service request this appointment is allocated to assess (e.g. incoming referral or procedure request).

elements.name: participant
elements.description: List of participants involved in the appointment.

elements.name: requestedPeriod
elements.description: A set of date ranges (potentially including times) that the appointment is preferred to be scheduled within.
